movie.Comments: [Inside Out] converts complex concepts -- like memory, subconcious, dreams and imagination -- into a visual game, a psychology lesson for both children and adults.

The Revenant is among the truly great films of 2015, and is Alejandro Gonzaezel Inarritu's greatest film... by the end you share in the characters' exhaustion of heart and soul, and perhaps in their glimpse at something infinite, beautiful, and terrifying.
The story quickly grew predictable and bland, and the design of the ghosts and the role they played in the story left me feeling disappointed.

movie.Movie_Name: In The Heart of the Sea
movie.Comments: Warner Bros. would have been better off sticking with the film's original March release date and selling it as a horror movie.
The re-invention might have been better as straight-up thriller. More story and less comedy fails would have helped.
Doing a course at National College of Ireland it's has been a excellent decision based on the teacher's and facilities around college.

NCI is a great college, I studied here part-time and it was very handy to get to class after work as it's right in the centre of Dublin, I just hopped on the LUAS. Love the area, nice and buzzy and loads of places nearby to grab food or a coffee too. Everyone in my class got on great, shared notes and study tips and made good friends. Lecturers were v good, notes always available online and felt like they were always available over email or phone or for a chat after class.

I took a 6 month intensive online course in Web Development and it was a fantastic experience. Our teacher Sam was absolutely great and I passed and graduated thanks to him. I met some friends I still keep in touch with and I would go black for more if I could.
